class_card_styles.description: A collection of ClassCardStyles declarations and sprite associations.

equipment_card_frame_sprite.description: From section sprites, must reference the id of a sprite (sized 504x588) used for the border for a Equipment card, square border (same as room).

room_card_frame_sprite.description: From section sprites, must reference the id of a sprite (sized 504x588) used for the border for a Room card, square border (same as equipment).

spell_card_frame_sprite.description: From section sprites, must reference the id of a sprite (sized 504x588) used for the border for a Spell card, hexagonal border.

unit_card_frame_sprite.description: From section sprites, must reference the id of a sprite (sized 504x588) used for the border for a Unit card, pointed top border.
